creator: Smart School Apps
descriptionHtml:
Math Worksheet, Workbook and Problem.

Have you ever thought your children solve math problems while using phones?

General description: This app can generate primary math problems as an activity,worksheet and quiz maker.
Due to the growing role of apps in our daily life, we decided on creating an educational app for elementary students and boost their knowledge and interest in mathematics!

Let “Math Worksheet” generate new math questions for you, grade your work, and help you practice all of your favorite topics!

Also it is a very useful app for home-education and home-school.

Why should we use this app?

As a math workbook with answers: this android app is like a math workbook but the difference is that it is not disposable and you can generate any number of problems and solve them.

Math worksheet or exam creator: By selecting your desired topics, the app will generate non-duplicate math questions.

Auto marking: Have the app analyze your work and show you exactly where you can improve next time! This app helps you get closer to that A+ grade in your school.
It can check your answers in two ways.

Check answers: by selecting this option, it just checks if your answers are correct or incorrect and marks them using symbols.
In addition to the case a, shows you the correct result.

Scoring and assessment: at the end of the exam, the app grades you descriptively also contains question count, correct count, incorrect count and not solved count.

Less cost: You needn’t buy different math workbooks and you can solve different questions for a lower fee. (The app is free by now)

Saving Time: This app helps the parents or students to save their time in two ways.

You needn't look for math worksheets or generate the math problems manually. Let the app do this.
You needn’t mark the paper manually because this app does it for you with just a click.

Useful use of mobile phones or tablets: one of the important parent’s concerns is overuse of phones by their children. You can teach your students the correct way of using phones by installing educational apps.

Math topics that are included in this app and you can generate worksheets or activities with them.

2nd Grade Topics

Addition
2-digit to 1-digit
2-digit to 2-digit
2-digit to 2-digit - Regrouping or Carrying

Subtraction
2-digit from 1-digit
2-digit from 2-digit
2-digit from 2-digit - Regrouping or borrowing

Comparing
2 and 3 digit numbers
Expressions

Rounding
Addition - 2-digit
Subtraction- 2-digit

Clock
Telling Time
To and Past
Half and Quarter
Convert 24H to 12H (Am and Pm)
Time Passed
Before and After

Measurement

Square
Ruler
Centimeter to Millimeter Conversion

Place Value
Chart
Expanded Form
Digit Value
Create Number

Miscellaneous
Mirror Image
Pattern - Geometric Shapes
Number To Word Conversion


3rd Grade Topics

Addition
3-digit to 1-digit
3-digit to 2-digit - Regrouping or Carrying
3-digit to 3-digit - Regrouping or Carrying

Subtraction
3 digit from 1 digit
3 digit from 2 digit
3 digit from 3 digit - Regrouping or borrowing

Multiplication
1-digit by 1-digit

Division
2-digit by 1-digit

Fraction
Introduction
Simplifying
Equivalent

Comparing
2 and 3 digit numbers
Expressions
Fraction

Rounding
Addition - 3-digit
Subtraction- 3-digit

Clock
Telling Time
To and Past
Half and Quarter
Time Passed
Before and After

Area and Perimeter
Square
Rectangle

Place Value
Digit Value
Expanded Form
Create Number

Miscellaneous
Number To Word Conversion

This app has been designed for 2nd and 3rd grade students and we will add the upper grades in new updates.

In the end, we ask you to share your comment with us to improve the quality of application.

Don’t forget to share this with your friends.
descriptionShort: Use the Math Worksheet Generator to practice math activities for 2nd, 3rd grade.
title: Math Worksheet Generator - 2nd 3rd Grade

This app has been designed for 2nd,3rd and 4th grade students.

Have you ever thought how your children solve math problems while using smartphones?

General description: This app can generate primary math problems as an activity,worksheet and quiz maker.

For example: You want your student to improve his/her skill on Addition and Subtraction. All you need to do is choose Addition and Subtraction topic and let the app to generate related math problems. Then your student has to solve the generated problems. at last, the app grade your student work.


Due to the growing role of apps in our daily life, we decided on creating an educational app for elementary students and boost their knowledge and interest in mathematics in a creative and attractive way!

Let “Math Worksheet Generator” generate new math questions for you, grade your math work, and help you practice all of your favorite topics!

Why should you use this app?

As a math workbook with answers: this android app is like a math workbook but the difference is that it is not disposable and you can generate any number of problems.

Math worksheet or exam creator: By selecting your desired topics, the app will generate non-duplicate math questions.

Auto marking: Have the app analyze your work and show you exactly where you can improve next time! This app helps you get closer to that A+ grade in your school.

Grade Your Work: It can check your answers in two ways.

Check answers: by selecting this option, it just checks if your answers are correct or incorrect and marks them using symbols.
Show answers: In addition to the case a, show you the correct result.

Scoring and assessment: at the end of the exam, the app grades you descriptively also contains question count, correct count, incorrect count and not solved count.

Less cost: You needn’t buy different math workbooks and you can solve different questions for a lower fee. (The app is free by now)

Saving Time: This app helps the parents or students to save their time in two ways.

You needn't look for math worksheets or generate the math problems manually. Let the app do this.
You needn’t mark the paper manually because this app does it for you with just a click.

Math topics that are included in this app and you can generate worksheets or activities with them.
